Class: ProximityTracker

ai/proximity-tracker. ProximityTracker

new ProximityTracker(cellSize)

This constructor is curried when exposed through the engine ref, so construct it without the first parameter, e.g. new sn.ProximityTracker(myCellSize);
Parameters:
Name Type Description
cellSize Number The width of each cell in the regular grid tracking the map contents.

Methods

find(x, y, r, sort) → {Array}

Finds the sprites nearest a point. Ignores height.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
x Number The x world position of the test point
y Number The y world position of the test point
r Number The radius to search. Note that although this is in pixels, it is horizontal pixels. The search area will be an ellipse to account for the isometric projection.
sort Boolean Pass true to have the results sorted in ascending distance from the test point.
Returns:
An array of sprites that fall within the search area.
Type
Array
